#summary Plupload uploader plugin

= Introduction =
For licensing issues, Plupload plugin is released as a separate plugin. It can be downloaded from [http://code.google.com/p/mollify/downloads/list]

= License =

Plupload itself (as well as Mollify Plupload plugin) is released under GPLv2 license. For more information, see license file in the plugin package, or [http://www.plupload.com]

= Installation =

1) Copy Plupload plugin folder into backend plugins folder

2) Register plugin in backend configuration.php
{{{
$PLUGINS = array(
	"Plupload" => array()
);
}}}	
3) Register client plugin in host page (ie. index.html):

   a) Add required javascript libraries (make sure they are imported only once):
{{{
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="client/include/jquery.tmpl.min.js"></script>   
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="backend/plugin/Plupload/client/plugin.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="backend/plugin/Plupload/client/plupload.full.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="backend/plugin/Plupload/client/texts_en.js"></script>
}}}

   Note that all these must be inserted *after* mollify init script import.

   b) Add any other needed Plupload libraries (for example Browserplus or Gears libs), see http://plupload.com
   
   c) Add plupload settings into client initialization, for example:
   {{{
mollify.init({
	"service-path": "backend/",
	"plupload": {
		runtimes : 'gears,flash,silverlight,browserplus,html5',
		max_file_size : '10mb',
		chunk_size : '1mb'
	}
});
}}}
	 For complete settings list, visit http://plupload.com

== Example host page ==

{{{
<html>
  <head>
	<title>Example Mollify host page with Plupload plugin</title>
	
	<meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
	
	<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="client/init.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="client/localization/texts_en.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="backend/plugin/Plupload/client/plugin.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="backend/plugin/Plupload/client/texts_en.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="backend/plugin/Plupload/client/plupload.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://bp.yahooapis.com/2.4.21/browserplus-min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="client/org.sjarvela.Mollify.nocache.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="client/include/jquery.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="client/include/jquery.tmpl.min.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		mollify.init({
			"service-path": "backend/",
			"plupload": {
				runtimes : 'gears,flash,silverlight,browserplus,html5',
				max_file_size : '180mb',
				chunk_size : '1mb'
			}
		});
	</script>
  </head>

  <body>
	<div id="mollify"></div>
  </body>
</html>
}}}
